languages.english-overview:
4imagesis as a web based PHP and MySQL for displaying images on the Internet.
4images can be configured through an administration area. 4images supports apart from the typical image formats like JPG, GIF and PNG, other data formats. Furthermore 4images includes a template system to modify the design of the gallery. An external language file allows for easy translation into other languages.
4images is free for private and non-commercial use. You can read the 4images license at their web site.

english-features.b: This is a list of features 4images includes:

ul.li: extensive, password protected adminstration are to configure and control the whole gallery system
database backup function
multi language support
easy to use installer for 4images
RSS-Feeds (latest images of the gallery, latest images of a category, latest comments of an image)
unlimited categories and subcategories
logging and statistics of clicks for each categorie or subcategory
title and description (optional) for every category
number of visible subcategories below categories can be defined

pre-configured for the following image- and file formats:
jpg, gif, png, aif, au, avi, mid, mov, mp3, mpg, swf, wav, ra, rm, zip, pdf
extendable for every file format (3gp, psd, smil, etc.)
upload through browser, through admin panel or via FTP (Batchupload)
automatic thumbnail generation (requires: ImageMagick, GD or NetPBM)
automatic resizing of images (requires: ImageMagick, GD or NetPBM)
showing IPTC and EXIF data of images
ratings by users for every image
individual to activate comment function for every image
download function for every image, including counter
download selected files as zip-archive
description and keywords for every image
easy to customize e-cards (colors, font)
protection against hotlinking
individual to activate comment function for every image
support of bb-codes like bold, italic, etc.
HTML-code in comment field can be disabled
spam control
badword function
automatic wrapping of long words
extensive user administration including registration (double opt-in)
extensive permission management for users and usergroups
lightbox for registered users
upload function for registered users
"Who is online" function
Newsletter function
encryped storage of passwords in the database
easy to customizable layout via templates to fit the own web layout
templates can be edited using a general HTML editor or via the administration area
standard template is included
many more templates avaible to download
